# free-bitcoin.lat — llms-full.txt
# Complete directory of all pages categorized by country and page type
# Updated: 2026-02-23

## GLOBAL PAGES

### Homepage
https://free-bitcoin.lat/ — Bitcoin in Latin America overview, live price widget, 15-country navigation

### Bitcoin Education
https://free-bitcoin.lat/bitcoin/ — What is Bitcoin? Complete guide for LatAm 2026

### Glossary
https://free-bitcoin.lat/glosario/ — 40+ Bitcoin/crypto terms in Spanish

### Security
https://free-bitcoin.lat/seguridad/ — Security hub
https://free-bitcoin.lat/seguridad/como-evitar-estafas/ — How to avoid Bitcoin scams (top 10 types)
https://free-bitcoin.lat/seguridad/mejores-wallets/ — Best Bitcoin wallets: Ledger vs Trezor vs software
https://free-bitcoin.lat/seguridad/p2p-seguro/ — Safe P2P trading guide

### Calculators
https://free-bitcoin.lat/calculadoras/ — Calculator hub + BTC converter for 15 currencies
https://free-bitcoin.lat/calculadoras/dca/ — Dollar Cost Averaging (DCA) calculator
https://free-bitcoin.lat/calculadoras/remesas/ — Remittance cost comparison calculator
https://free-bitcoin.lat/calculadoras/premium-btc/ — BTC premium index for Argentina and Venezuela
https://free-bitcoin.lat/calculadoras/comisiones/ — Transaction fee calculator (Lightning vs on-chain vs USDT)

### Forum
https://free-bitcoin.lat/foro/ — Anonymous Bitcoin forum hub for Latin America

## REMITTANCE CORRIDORS

https://free-bitcoin.lat/remesas/us-mx/ — US to Mexico: Lightning, USDT P2P, Western Union comparison
https://free-bitcoin.lat/remesas/us-gt/ — US to Guatemala: remittances = ~19% of GDP
https://free-bitcoin.lat/remesas/us-hn/ — US to Honduras: remittances = ~20% of GDP
https://free-bitcoin.lat/remesas/us-sv/ — US to El Salvador: Lightning native (USD, no conversion)
https://free-bitcoin.lat/remesas/us-co/ — US to Colombia: Nequi, P2P options
https://free-bitcoin.lat/remesas/us-pe/ — US to Peru: Yape, Plin P2P
https://free-bitcoin.lat/remesas/us-bo/ — US to Bolivia: ban lifted 2024

## MEXICO (es-MX) — Priority Market

https://free-bitcoin.lat/mx/ — Bitcoin in Mexico: hub page
https://free-bitcoin.lat/mx/precio-bitcoin-mxn/ — BTC/MXN live price + converter
https://free-bitcoin.lat/mx/como-comprar-bitcoin/ — How to buy Bitcoin in Mexico (SPEI, OXXO, card)
https://free-bitcoin.lat/mx/impuestos-bitcoin/ — Bitcoin taxes in Mexico (SAT guide)
https://free-bitcoin.lat/mx/regulacion-cripto/ — Crypto regulation in Mexico (Ley FinTech, Banxico)
https://free-bitcoin.lat/mx/mejores-exchanges/ — Best exchanges for Mexico
https://free-bitcoin.lat/mx/como-vender-bitcoin/ — How to sell Bitcoin in Mexico

## BRAZIL (pt-BR) — Priority Market

https://free-bitcoin.lat/br/ — Bitcoin no Brasil: página hub
https://free-bitcoin.lat/br/preco-bitcoin-brl/ — Preço BTC/BRL em tempo real
https://free-bitcoin.lat/br/como-comprar-bitcoin/ — Como comprar Bitcoin com PIX
https://free-bitcoin.lat/br/impostos-bitcoin/ — Imposto de renda sobre criptoativos (IRPF 2026)
https://free-bitcoin.lat/br/regulacao-cripto/ — Regulação cripto Brasil (Lei 14.478/2022)
https://free-bitcoin.lat/br/melhores-exchanges/ — Melhores corretoras de Bitcoin no Brasil

## ARGENTINA (es-AR) — Priority Market

https://free-bitcoin.lat/ar/ — Bitcoin en Argentina: hub page
https://free-bitcoin.lat/ar/precio-bitcoin-ars/ — Precio BTC/ARS en tiempo real
https://free-bitcoin.lat/ar/dolar-crypto/ — Qué es el dólar cripto y cómo funciona
https://free-bitcoin.lat/ar/como-comprar-bitcoin/ — Cómo comprar Bitcoin en Argentina
https://free-bitcoin.lat/ar/impuestos-bitcoin/ — Impuestos cripto Argentina (AFIP/ARCA)
https://free-bitcoin.lat/ar/regulacion-cripto/ — Regulación CNV PSAV 2026
https://free-bitcoin.lat/ar/mejores-exchanges/ — Mejores exchanges para Argentina

## VENEZUELA (es-VE) — Priority Market

https://free-bitcoin.lat/ve/ — Bitcoin en Venezuela: hub page
https://free-bitcoin.lat/ve/bitcoin-venezuela/ — Historia y adopción de Bitcoin en Venezuela
https://free-bitcoin.lat/ve/p2p-seguro/ — P2P seguro en Venezuela (estafas y protección)
https://free-bitcoin.lat/ve/como-comprar-bitcoin/ — Cómo comprar Bitcoin en Venezuela
https://free-bitcoin.lat/ve/regulacion-cripto/ — Regulación SUNACRIP Venezuela
https://free-bitcoin.lat/ve/mejores-exchanges/ — Mejores exchanges para Venezuela

https://free-bitcoin.lat/sv/ — Bitcoin en El Salvador hub (Ley Bitcoin, Lightning)

https://free-bitcoin.lat/gt/ — Bitcoin en Guatemala hub (remesas 19% PIB)

## BOLIVIA (es-BO)
https://free-bitcoin.lat/bo/ — Bitcoin en Bolivia hub (ban levantado 2024)

## PARAGUAY (es-PY)
https://free-bitcoin.lat/py/ — Bitcoin en Paraguay hub (minería Itaipú)

## URUGUAY (es-UY)
https://free-bitcoin.lat/uy/ — Bitcoin en Uruguay hub (Ley 20.345)

## ECUADOR (es-EC)
https://free-bitcoin.lat/ec/ — Bitcoin en Ecuador hub (dolarizado, BCE)

## PANAMA (es-PA)
https://free-bitcoin.lat/pa/ — Bitcoin en Panamá hub (Ley 247 en debate)

## HONDURAS (es-HN)
https://free-bitcoin.lat/hn/ — Bitcoin en Honduras hub (remesas >20% PIB)

## API ENDPOINTS (for developers)
https://free-bitcoin.lat/api/price.php — BTC price in 15 LatAm currencies (JSON)
https://free-bitcoin.lat/api/premium.php?country=ar — BTC premium Argentina
https://free-bitcoin.lat/api/premium.php?country=ve — BTC/USDT premium Venezuela
https://free-bitcoin.lat/api/remittance.php?corridor=us-mx — Remittance fee table
https://free-bitcoin.lat/api/forum.php — Anonymous forum API
